title: Milkomeda Oracle
description: Solidity developers who want to deploy an oracle on an EVM sidechain need a way to expose their sidechain oracle to the Cardano mainnet
solution: Wrapping oracles with a smart contract. Users call the oracles from Cardano mainnet and the response are also sent back to the mainchain
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
